products.description: To the palates of coffee lovers around the world, it may just have the perfect balance of brightness and body, with a flavor that is “pure coffee”.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) is available for an additional fee. Free shipping on orders over R500!

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day hassle-free return policy. Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

policies.title: Shipping Policy
policies.content: We ship nationwide across South Africa. Standard shipping: 5-7 business days (R99 or FREE over R500). Express shipping: 2-3 business days (R199). Collection available at selected locations.

policies.title: Return & Refund Policy
policies.content: 30-day return window for all items. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds processed within 5-7 business days. Return shipping is free for defective items.
